body_html:
@reedwm In which commit was this fixed ? I'm still noticing weird behavior regarding allocation. For instance, it's impossible to allocate a tensor filled with zeros that's above half the total GPU memory. I have a GPU with 12GB of vram yet I can't allocate more than ~5.5GB. Does not make any sense.

See #18380 (comment)

body:
@reedwm In which commit was this fixed ? I'm still noticing weird behavior regarding allocation. For instance, it's impossible to allocate a tensor filled with zeros that's above half the total GPU memory. I have a GPU with 12GB of vram yet I can't allocate more than ~5.5GB. Does not make any sense.

See https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/18380#issuecomment-380110126
